FAQ

What is your full name?

Maxwill Lelan Kelly

What is your date of birth?

2nd June 1999

Where are you from?

This is quite a complex question. I was born in Hastings, East Sussex on the south coast of England. However, I moved from there when I was 5 to The Hague in the Netherlands and then to Wellington, New Zealand. I moved to Aberdeen in 2012 where I went to secondary school. Now for University I'm studying in Dundee.

Where are you from?

This is quite a complex question. I was born in Hastings, East Sussex on the south coast of England.
